name: ether
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 10 PP for a selected move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This medicine can restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This medicine can restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This medicine can be used to restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.
